page.title: 12RECREATION IN AVERHAM
page.content: The main forms of recreation in Averham are:- gardening,barbecues,fishing,riding, hockey,watching television,reading, football,walking,cycling,do it yourself activities,Womens Institute and the Theatre Luncheon Club. Riding is a favourite pastime.People also enjoy fishing in pools and the river both for relaxation and as a competitive sport.Many people enjoy the interesting walks of the area. There is a lack of play area for children.A playing field is needed.The school grounds have been utilised for this purpose. There are two clubs in the area.The Womens Institute meets once a month at the school to discuss items of topical interest.The Ladies Luncheon Club meets at Averham Theatre and has visiting speakers.
